name: Robo Run (itch) (Freezoroni Studios)
description:
Ctrl + F to Enable/ Disable Fullscreen

In Robo Run you Play as a Robot who finds some cool shoes. The shoes themselves have the side effect of making the wearer constantly move. Run your way through 15 levels while avoiding spikes and pits.

This game was made for the Boundless Game Jam with the theme of "One Button"
